marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis.pitch
Class HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis.pitch.HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzer

public class HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object

Initial pitch, voicing, maximum frequency of voicing, and refined pitch estimation as described in: Y. Stylianou (1996) “A pitch and maximum voiced frequency estimation technique adapted to harmonic models of speech,” IEEE Nordic Signal Processing Symposium, Helsinki, Finland, Sept. 1996.

Author:
Oytun Türk
